text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: rAjoparicaro nAma dharmanityo mahIpatiH
text.ur: rājoparicaro nāma dharmanityo mahīpatiḥ

text.ascii: babhUva mRgayAM gantuM sa kadA cid dhRtavrataH
text.ur: babhūva mr̥gayāṁ gantuṁ sa kadā cid dhr̥tavrataḥ

text.ascii: sa cediviSayaM ramyaM vasuH pauravanandanaH
text.ur: sa cediviṣayaṁ ramyaṁ vasuḥ pauravanandanaḥ

text.ascii: indropadezAj jagrAha grahaNIyaM mahIpatiH
text.ur: indropadeśāj jagrāha grahaṇīyaṁ mahīpatiḥ

text.ascii: tam Azrame nyastazastraM nivasantaM taporatim
text.ur: tam āśrame nyastaśastraṁ nivasantaṁ taporatim

text.ascii: devaH sAkSAt svayaM vajrI samupAyAn mahIpatim
text.ur: devaḥ sākṣāt svayaṁ vajrī samupāyān mahīpatim

text.ascii: indratvam arho rAjAyaM tapasety anucintya vai
text.ur: indratvam arho rājāyaṁ tapasety anucintya vai

text.ascii: taM sAntvena nRpaM sAkSAt tapasaH saMnyavartayat
text.ur: taṁ sāntvena nr̥paṁ sākṣāt tapasaḥ saṁnyavartayat

text.ascii: indra uvAca
text.ur: indra uvāca

text.ascii: na saMkIryeta dharmo 'yaM pRthivyAM pRthivIpate
text.ur: na saṁkīryeta dharmo ’yaṁ pr̥thivyāṁ pr̥thivīpate

text.ascii: taM pAhi dharmo hi dhRtaH kRtsnaM dhArayate jagat
text.ud: तं पाहि धर्मो हि धृतः कृत्स्नं धारयते जगत्
text.ur: taṁ pāhi dharmo hi dhr̥taḥ kr̥tsnaṁ dhārayate jagat

text.ascii: lokyaM dharmaM pAlaya tvaM nityayuktaH samAhitaH
text.ud: लोक्यं धर्मं पालय त्वं नित्ययुक्तः समाहितः
text.ur: lokyaṁ dharmaṁ pālaya tvaṁ nityayuktaḥ samāhitaḥ

text.ascii: dharmayuktas tato lokAn puNyAn Apsyasi zAzvatAn
text.ur: dharmayuktas tato lokān puṇyān āpsyasi śāśvatān

text.ascii: diviSThasya bhuviSThas tvaM sakhA bhUtvA mama priyaH
text.ud: दिविष्ठस्य भुविष्ठस्त्वं सखा भूत्वा मम प्रियः
text.ur: diviṣṭhasya bhuviṣṭhas tvaṁ sakhā bhūtvā mama priyaḥ

text.ascii: UdhaH pRthivyA yo dezas tam Avasa narAdhipa
text.ur: ūdhaḥ pr̥thivyā yo deśas tam āvasa narādhipa

text.ascii: pazavyaz caiva puNyaz ca susthiro dhanadhAnyavAn
text.ur: paśavyaś caiva puṇyaś ca susthiro dhanadhānyavān

text.ascii: svArakSyaz caiva saumyaz ca bhogyair bhUmiguNair yutaH
text.ur: svārakṣyaś caiva saumyaś ca bhogyair bhūmiguṇair yutaḥ

text.ascii: aty anyAn eSa dezo hi dhanaratnAdibhir yutaH
text.ur: aty anyān eṣa deśo hi dhanaratnādibhir yutaḥ

text.ascii: vasupUrNA ca vasudhA vasa cediSu cedipa
text.ud: वसुपूर्णा च वसुधा वस चेदिषु चेदिप
text.ur: vasupūrṇā ca vasudhā vasa cediṣu cedipa

text.ascii: dharmazIlA janapadAH susaMtoSAz ca sAdhavaH
text.ur: dharmaśīlā janapadāḥ susaṁtoṣāś ca sādhavaḥ

text.ascii: na ca mithyApralApo 'tra svaireSv api kuto 'nyathA
text.ur: na ca mithyāpralāpo ’tra svaireṣv api kuto ’nyathā

text.ascii: na ca pitrA vibhajyante narA guruhite ratAH
text.ud: न च पित्रा विभज्यन्ते नरा गुरुहिते रताः
text.ur: na ca pitrā vibhajyante narā guruhite ratāḥ

text.ascii: yuJjate dhuri no gAz ca kRzAH saMdhukSayanti ca
text.ud: युञ्जते धुरि नो गाश्च कृशाः संधुक्षयन्ति च
text.ur: yuñjate dhuri no gāś ca kr̥śāḥ saṁdhukṣayanti ca

text.ascii: sarve varNAH svadharmasthAH sadA cediSu mAnada
text.ud: सर्वे वर्णाः स्वधर्मस्थाः सदा चेदिषु मानद
text.ur: sarve varṇāḥ svadharmasthāḥ sadā cediṣu mānada

text.ascii: na te 'sty aviditaM kiM cit triSu lokeSu yad bhavet
text.ur: na te ’sty aviditaṁ kiṁ cit triṣu lokeṣu yad bhavet

text.ascii: devopabhogyaM divyaM ca AkAze sphATikaM mahat
text.ud: देवोपभोग्यं दिव्यं च आकाशे स्फाटिकं महत्
text.ur: devopabhogyaṁ divyaṁ ca ākāśe sphāṭikaṁ mahat

text.ascii: AkAzagaM tvAM maddattaM vimAnam upapatsyate
text.ur: ākāśagaṁ tvāṁ maddattaṁ vimānam upapatsyate

text.ascii: tvam ekaH sarvamartyeSu vimAnavaram AsthitaH
text.ur: tvam ekaḥ sarvamartyeṣu vimānavaram āsthitaḥ

text.ascii: cariSyasy uparistho vai devo vigrahavAn iva
text.ur: cariṣyasy uparistho vai devo vigrahavān iva

text.ascii: dadAmi te vaijayantIM mAlAm amlAnapaGkajAm
text.ur: dadāmi te vaijayantīṁ mālām amlānapaṅkajām

text.ascii: dhArayiSyati saMgrAme yA tvAM zastrair avikSatam
text.ur: dhārayiṣyati saṁgrāme yā tvāṁ śastrair avikṣatam

text.ascii: lakSaNaM caitad eveha bhavitA te narAdhipa
text.ur: lakṣaṇaṁ caitad eveha bhavitā te narādhipa

text.ascii: indramAleti vikhyAtaM dhanyam apratimaM mahat
text.ur: indramāleti vikhyātaṁ dhanyam apratimaṁ mahat

text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: yaSTiM ca vaiNavIM tasmai dadau vRtraniSUdanaH
text.ud: यष्टिं च वैणवीं तस्मै ददौ वृत्रनिषूदनः
text.ur: yaṣṭiṁ ca vaiṇavīṁ tasmai dadau vr̥traniṣūdanaḥ

text.ascii: iSTapradAnam uddizya ziSTAnAM paripAlinIm
text.ur: iṣṭapradānam uddiśya śiṣṭānāṁ paripālinīm

text.ascii: tasyAH zakrasya pUjArthaM bhUmau bhUmipatis tadA
text.ur: tasyāḥ śakrasya pūjārthaṁ bhūmau bhūmipatis tadā

text.ascii: pravezaM kArayAm Asa gate saMvatsare tadA
text.ur: praveśaṁ kārayām āsa gate saṁvatsare tadā

text.ascii: tataH prabhRti cAdyApi yaSTyAH kSitipasattamaiH
text.ur: tataḥ prabhr̥ti cādyāpi yaṣṭyāḥ kṣitipasattamaiḥ

text.ascii: pravezaH kriyate rAjan yathA tena pravartitaH
text.ur: praveśaḥ kriyate rājan yathā tena pravartitaḥ

text.ascii: aparedyus tathA cAsyAH kriyate ucchrayo nRpaiH
text.ur: aparedyus tathā cāsyāḥ kriyate ucchrayo nr̥paiḥ

text.ascii: alaMkRtAyAH piTakair gandhair mAlyaiz ca bhUSaNaiH
text.ur: alaṁkr̥tāyāḥ piṭakair gandhair mālyaiś ca bhūṣaṇaiḥ

text.ascii: mAlyadAmaparikSiptA vidhivat kriyate 'pi ca
text.ur: mālyadāmaparikṣiptā vidhivat kriyate ’pi ca

text.ascii: bhagavAn pUjyate cAtra hAsyarUpeNa zaMkaraH
text.ur: bhagavān pūjyate cātra hāsyarūpeṇa śaṁkaraḥ

text.ascii: svayam eva gRhItena vasoH prItyA mahAtmanaH
text.ur: svayam eva gr̥hītena vasoḥ prītyā mahātmanaḥ

text.ascii: etAM pUjAM mahendras tu dRSTvA deva kRtAM zubhAm
text.ud: एतां पूजां महेन्द्रस्तु दृष्ट्वा देव कृतां शुभाम्
text.ur: etāṁ pūjāṁ mahendras tu dr̥ṣṭvā deva kr̥tāṁ śubhām

text.ascii: vasunA rAjamukhyena prItimAn abravId vibhuH
text.ur: vasunā rājamukhyena prītimān abravīd vibhuḥ

text.ascii: ye pUjayiSyanti narA rAjAnaz ca mahaM mama
text.ud: ये पूजयिष्यन्ति नरा राजानश्च महं मम
text.ur: ye pūjayiṣyanti narā rājānaś ca mahaṁ mama

text.ascii: kArayiSyanti ca mudA yathA cedipatir nRpaH
text.ur: kārayiṣyanti ca mudā yathā cedipatir nr̥paḥ

text.ascii: teSAM zrIr vijayaz caiva sarASTrANAM bhaviSyati
text.ur: teṣāṁ śrīr vijayaś caiva sarāṣṭrāṇāṁ bhaviṣyati

text.ascii: tathA sphIto janapado muditaz ca bhaviSyati
text.ur: tathā sphīto janapado muditaś ca bhaviṣyati

text.ascii: evaM mahAtmanA tena mahendreNa narAdhipa
text.ur: evaṁ mahātmanā tena mahendreṇa narādhipa

text.ascii: vasuH prItyA maghavatA mahArAjo 'bhisatkRtaH
text.ur: vasuḥ prītyā maghavatā mahārājo ’bhisatkr̥taḥ

text.ascii: utsavaM kArayiSyanti sadA zakrasya ye narAH
text.ud: उत्सवं कारयिष्यन्ति सदा शक्रस्य ये नराः
text.ur: utsavaṁ kārayiṣyanti sadā śakrasya ye narāḥ

text.ascii: bhUmidAnAdibhir dAnair yathA pUtA bhavanti vai
text.ur: bhūmidānādibhir dānair yathā pūtā bhavanti vai

text.ascii: varadAnamahAyajJais tathA zakrotsavena te
text.ur: varadānamahāyajñais tathā śakrotsavena te

text.ascii: saMpUjito maghavatA vasuz cedipatis tadA
text.ur: saṁpūjito maghavatā vasuś cedipatis tadā

text.ascii: pAlayAm Asa dharmeNa cedisthaH pRthivIm imAm
text.ur: pālayām āsa dharmeṇa cedisthaḥ pr̥thivīm imām

text.ascii: indraprItyA bhUmipatiz cakArendramahaM vasuH
text.ur: indraprītyā bhūmipatiś cakārendramahaṁ vasuḥ

text.ascii: putrAz cAsya mahAvIryAH paJcAsann amitaujasaH
text.ur: putrāś cāsya mahāvīryāḥ pañcāsann amitaujasaḥ

text.ascii: nAnArAjyeSu ca sutAn sa samrAD abhyaSecayat
text.ur: nānārājyeṣu ca sutān sa samrāḍ abhyaṣecayat

text.ascii: mahAratho magadharAD vizruto yo bRhadrathaH
text.ur: mahāratho magadharāḍ viśruto yo br̥hadrathaḥ

text.ascii: pratyagrahaH kuzAmbaz ca yam Ahur maNivAhanam
text.ur: pratyagrahaḥ kuśāmbaś ca yam āhur maṇivāhanam

text.ascii: macchillaz ca yaduz caiva rAjanyaz cAparAjitaH
text.ur: macchillaś ca yaduś caiva rājanyaś cāparājitaḥ

text.ascii: ete tasya sutA rAjan rAjarSer bhUritejasaH
text.ur: ete tasya sutā rājan rājarṣer bhūritejasaḥ

text.ascii: nyavezayan nAmabhiH svais te dezAMz ca purANi ca
text.ur: nyaveśayan nāmabhiḥ svais te deśāṁś ca purāṇi ca

text.ascii: vAsavAH paJca rAjAnaH pRthagvaMzAz ca zAzvatAH
text.ur: vāsavāḥ pañca rājānaḥ pr̥thagvaṁśāś ca śāśvatāḥ

text.ascii: vasantam indraprAsAde AkAze sphATike ca tam
text.ur: vasantam indraprāsāde ākāśe sphāṭike ca tam

text.ascii: upatasthur mahAtmAnaM gandharvApsaraso nRpam
text.ur: upatasthur mahātmānaṁ gandharvāpsaraso nr̥pam

text.ascii: rAjoparicarety evaM nAma tasyAtha vizrutam
text.ur: rājoparicarety evaṁ nāma tasyātha viśrutam

text.ascii: puropavAhinIM tasya nadIM zuktimatIM giriH
text.ur: puropavāhinīṁ tasya nadīṁ śuktimatīṁ giriḥ

text.ascii: arautsIc cetanAyuktaH kAmAt kolAhalaH kila
text.ur: arautsīc cetanāyuktaḥ kāmāt kolāhalaḥ kila

text.ascii: giriM kolAhalaM taM tu padA vasur atADayat
text.ud: गिरिं कोलाहलं तं तु पदा वसुरताडयत्
text.ur: giriṁ kolāhalaṁ taṁ tu padā vasur atāḍayat

text.ascii: nizcakrAma nadI tena prahAravivareNa sA
text.ur: niścakrāma nadī tena prahāravivareṇa sā

text.ascii: tasyAM nadyAm ajanayan mithunaM parvataH svayam
text.ur: tasyāṁ nadyām ajanayan mithunaṁ parvataḥ svayam

text.ascii: tasmAd vimokSaNAt prItA nadI rAjJe nyavedayat
text.ur: tasmād vimokṣaṇāt prītā nadī rājñe nyavedayat

text.ascii: yaH pumAn abhavat tatra taM sa rAjarSisattamaH
text.ur: yaḥ pumān abhavat tatra taṁ sa rājarṣisattamaḥ

text.ascii: vasur vasupradaz cakre senApatim ariMdamam
text.ur: vasur vasupradaś cakre senāpatim ariṁdamam

text.ascii: cakAra patnIM kanyAM tu dayitAM girikAM nRpaH
text.ud: चकार पत्नीं कन्यां तु दयितां गिरिकां नृपः
text.ur: cakāra patnīṁ kanyāṁ tu dayitāṁ girikāṁ nr̥paḥ

text.ascii: vasoH patnI tu girikA kAmAt kAle nyavedayat
text.ud: वसोः पत्नी तु गिरिका कामात्काले न्यवेदयत्
text.ur: vasoḥ patnī tu girikā kāmāt kāle nyavedayat

text.ascii: RtukAlam anuprAptaM snAtA puMsavane zuciH
text.ur: r̥tukālam anuprāptaṁ snātā puṁsavane śuciḥ

text.ascii: tadahaH pitaraz cainam Ucur jahi mRgAn iti
text.ur: tadahaḥ pitaraś cainam ūcur jahi mr̥gān iti

text.ascii: taM rAjasattamaM prItAs tadA matimatAM varam
text.ur: taṁ rājasattamaṁ prītās tadā matimatāṁ varam

text.ascii: sa pitqNAM niyogaM tam avyatikramya pArthivaH
text.ur: sa pitr̥̄ṇāṁ niyogaṁ tam avyatikramya pārthivaḥ

text.ascii: cacAra mRgayAM kAmI girikAm eva saMsmaran
text.ur: cacāra mr̥gayāṁ kāmī girikām eva saṁsmaran

text.ascii: atIva rUpasaMpannAM sAkSAc chriyam ivAparAm
text.ur: atīva rūpasaṁpannāṁ sākṣāc chriyam ivāparām

text.ascii: tasya retaH pracaskanda carato rucire vane
text.ud: तस्य रेतः प्रचस्कन्द चरतो रुचिरे वने
text.ur: tasya retaḥ pracaskanda carato rucire vane

text.ascii: skannamAtraM ca tad reto vRkSapatreNa bhUmipaH
text.ur: skannamātraṁ ca tad reto vr̥kṣapatreṇa bhūmipaḥ

text.ascii: pratijagrAha mithyA me na skanded reta ity uta
text.ud: प्रतिजग्राह मिथ्या मे न स्कन्देद्रेत इत्युत
text.ur: pratijagrāha mithyā me na skanded reta ity uta

text.ascii: Rtuz ca tasyAH patnyA me na moghaH syAd iti prabhuH
text.ud: ऋतुश्च तस्याः पत्न्या मे न मोघः स्यादिति प्रभुः
text.ur: r̥tuś ca tasyāḥ patnyā me na moghaḥ syād iti prabhuḥ

text.ascii: saMcintyaivaM tadA rAjA vicArya ca punaH punaH
text.ud: संचिन्त्यैवं तदा राजा विचार्य च पुनः पुनः
text.ur: saṁcintyaivaṁ tadā rājā vicārya ca punaḥ punaḥ

text.ascii: amoghatvaM ca vijJAya retaso rAjasattamaH
text.ur: amoghatvaṁ ca vijñāya retaso rājasattamaḥ

text.ascii: zukraprasthApane kAlaM mahiSyAH prasamIkSya saH
text.ur: śukraprasthāpane kālaṁ mahiṣyāḥ prasamīkṣya saḥ

text.ascii: abhimantryAtha tac chukram ArAt tiSThantam Azugam
text.ur: abhimantryātha tac chukram ārāt tiṣṭhantam āśugam

text.ascii: sUkSmadharmArthatattvajJo jJAtvA zyenaM tato 'bravIt
text.ur: sūkṣmadharmārthatattvajño jñātvā śyenaṁ tato ’bravīt

text.ascii: matpriyArtham idaM saumya zukraM mama gRhaM naya
text.ud: मत्प्रियार्थमिदं सौम्य शुक्रं मम गृहं नय
text.ur: matpriyārtham idaṁ saumya śukraṁ mama gr̥haṁ naya

text.ascii: girikAyAH prayacchAzu tasyA hy Artavam adya vai
text.ur: girikāyāḥ prayacchāśu tasyā hy ārtavam adya vai

text.ascii: gRhItvA tat tadA zyenas tUrNam utpatya vegavAn
text.ur: gr̥hītvā tat tadā śyenas tūrṇam utpatya vegavān

text.ascii: javaM paramam AsthAya pradudrAva vihaMgamaH
text.ur: javaṁ paramam āsthāya pradudrāva vihaṁgamaḥ

text.ascii: tam apazyad athAyAntaM zyenaM zyenas tathAparaH
text.ur: tam apaśyad athāyāntaṁ śyenaṁ śyenas tathāparaḥ

text.ascii: abhyadravac ca taM sadyo dRSTvaivAmiSazaGkayA
text.ur: abhyadravac ca taṁ sadyo dr̥ṣṭvaivāmiṣaśaṅkayā

text.ascii: tuNDayuddham athAkAze tAv ubhau saMpracakratuH
text.ur: tuṇḍayuddham athākāśe tāv ubhau saṁpracakratuḥ

text.ascii: yudhyator apatad retas tac cApi yamunAmbhasi
text.ur: yudhyator apatad retas tac cāpi yamunāmbhasi

text.ascii: tatrAdriketi vikhyAtA brahmazApAd varApsarAH
text.ur: tatrādriketi vikhyātā brahmaśāpād varāpsarāḥ

text.ascii: mInabhAvam anuprAptA babhUva yamunAcarI
text.ur: mīnabhāvam anuprāptā babhūva yamunācarī

text.ascii: zyenapAdaparibhraSTaM tad vIryam atha vAsavam
text.ur: śyenapādaparibhraṣṭaṁ tad vīryam atha vāsavam

text.ascii: jagrAha tarasopetya sAdrikA matsyarUpiNI
text.ur: jagrāha tarasopetya sādrikā matsyarūpiṇī

text.ascii: kadA cid atha matsIM tAM babandhur matsyajIvinaH
text.ur: kadā cid atha matsīṁ tāṁ babandhur matsyajīvinaḥ

text.ascii: mAse ca dazame prApte tadA bharatasattama
text.ud: मासे च दशमे प्राप्ते तदा भरतसत्तम
text.ur: māse ca daśame prāpte tadā bharatasattama

text.ascii: ujjahrur udarAt tasyAH strIpumAMsaM ca mAnuSam
text.ur: ujjahrur udarāt tasyāḥ strīpumāṁsaṁ ca mānuṣam

text.ascii: AzcaryabhUtaM matvA tad rAjJas te pratyavedayan
text.ur: āścaryabhūtaṁ matvā tad rājñas te pratyavedayan

text.ascii: kAye matsyA imau rAjan saMbhUtau mAnuSAv iti
text.ur: kāye matsyā imau rājan saṁbhūtau mānuṣāv iti

text.ascii: tayoH pumAMsaM jagrAha rAjoparicaras tadA
text.ur: tayoḥ pumāṁsaṁ jagrāha rājoparicaras tadā

text.ascii: sa matsyo nAma rAjAsId dhArmikaH satyasaMgaraH
text.ur: sa matsyo nāma rājāsīd dhārmikaḥ satyasaṁgaraḥ

text.ascii: sApsarA muktazApA ca kSaNena samapadyata
text.ur: sāpsarā muktaśāpā ca kṣaṇena samapadyata

text.ascii: puroktA yA bhagavatA tiryagyonigatA zubhe
text.ur: puroktā yā bhagavatā tiryagyonigatā śubhe

text.ascii: mAnuSau janayitvA tvaM zApamokSam avApsyasi
text.ur: mānuṣau janayitvā tvaṁ śāpamokṣam avāpsyasi

text.ascii: tataH sA janayitvA tau vizastA matsyaghAtinA
text.ud: ततः सा जनयित्वा तौ विशस्ता मत्स्यघातिना
text.ur: tataḥ sā janayitvā tau viśastā matsyaghātinā

text.ascii: saMtyajya matsyarUpaM sA divyaM rUpam avApya ca
text.ud: संत्यज्य मत्स्यरूपं सा दिव्यं रूपमवाप्य च
text.ur: saṁtyajya matsyarūpaṁ sā divyaṁ rūpam avāpya ca

text.ascii: siddharSicAraNapathaM jagAmAtha varApsarAH
text.ur: siddharṣicāraṇapathaṁ jagāmātha varāpsarāḥ

text.ascii: yA kanyA duhitA tasyA matsyA matsyasagandhinI
text.ud: या कन्या दुहिता तस्या मत्स्या मत्स्यसगन्धिनी
text.ur: yā kanyā duhitā tasyā matsyā matsyasagandhinī

text.ascii: rAjJA dattAtha dAzAya iyaM tava bhavatv iti
text.ud: राज्ञा दत्ताथ दाशाय इयं तव भवत्विति
text.ur: rājñā dattātha dāśāya iyaṁ tava bhavatv iti

text.ascii: rUpasattvasamAyuktA sarvaiH samuditA guNaiH
text.ur: rūpasattvasamāyuktā sarvaiḥ samuditā guṇaiḥ

text.ascii: sA tu satyavatI nAma matsyaghAtyabhisaMzrayAt
text.ur: sā tu satyavatī nāma matsyaghātyabhisaṁśrayāt

text.ascii: AsIn matsyasagandhaiva kaM cit kAlaM zucismitA
text.ur: āsīn matsyasagandhaiva kaṁ cit kālaṁ śucismitā

text.ascii: zuzrUSArthaM pitur nAvaM tAM tu vAhayatIM jale
text.ud: शुश्रूषार्थं पितुर्नावं तां तु वाहयतीं जले
text.ur: śuśrūṣārthaṁ pitur nāvaṁ tāṁ tu vāhayatīṁ jale

text.ascii: tIrthayAtrAM parikrAmann apazyad vai parAzaraH
text.ur: tīrthayātrāṁ parikrāmann apaśyad vai parāśaraḥ

text.ascii: atIva rUpasaMpannAM siddhAnAm api kAGkSitAm
text.ur: atīva rūpasaṁpannāṁ siddhānām api kāṅkṣitām

text.ascii: dRSTvaiva ca sa tAM dhImAMz cakame cArudarzanAm
text.ud: दृष्ट्वैव च स तां धीमांश्चकमे चारुदर्शनाम्
text.ur: dr̥ṣṭvaiva ca sa tāṁ dhīmāṁś cakame cārudarśanām

text.ascii: vidvAMs tAM vAsavIM kanyAM kAryavAn munipuMgavaH
text.ur: vidvāṁs tāṁ vāsavīṁ kanyāṁ kāryavān munipuṁgavaḥ

text.ascii: sAbravIt pazya bhagavan pArAvAre RSIn sthitAn
text.ur: sābravīt paśya bhagavan pārāvāre r̥ṣīn sthitān

text.ascii: Avayor dRzyator ebhiH kathaM nu syAt samAgamaH
text.ur: āvayor dr̥śyator ebhiḥ kathaṁ nu syāt samāgamaḥ

text.ascii: evaM tayokto bhagavAn nIhAram asRjat prabhuH
text.ur: evaṁ tayokto bhagavān nīhāram asr̥jat prabhuḥ

text.ascii: yena dezaH sa sarvas tu tamobhUta ivAbhavat
text.ud: येन देशः स सर्वस्तु तमोभूत इवाभवत्
text.ur: yena deśaḥ sa sarvas tu tamobhūta ivābhavat

text.ascii: dRSTvA sRSTaM tu nIhAraM tatas taM paramarSiNA
text.ud: दृष्ट्वा सृष्टं तु नीहारं ततस्तं परमर्षिणा
text.ur: dr̥ṣṭvā sr̥ṣṭaṁ tu nīhāraṁ tatas taṁ paramarṣiṇā

text.ascii: vismitA cAbravIt kanyA vrIDitA ca manasvinI
text.ur: vismitā cābravīt kanyā vrīḍitā ca manasvinī

text.ascii: viddhi mAM bhagavan kanyAM sadA pitRvazAnugAm
text.ur: viddhi māṁ bhagavan kanyāṁ sadā pitr̥vaśānugām

text.ascii: tvatsaMyogAc ca duSyeta kanyAbhAvo mamAnagha
text.ur: tvatsaṁyogāc ca duṣyeta kanyābhāvo mamānagha

text.ascii: kanyAtve dUSite cApi kathaM zakSye dvijottama
text.ud: कन्यात्वे दूषिते चापि कथं शक्ष्ये द्विजोत्तम
text.ur: kanyātve dūṣite cāpi kathaṁ śakṣye dvijottama

text.ascii: gantuM gRhaM gRhe cAhaM dhIman na sthAtum utsahe
text.ud: गन्तुं गृहं गृहे चाहं धीमन्न स्थातुमुत्सहे
text.ur: gantuṁ gr̥haṁ gr̥he cāhaṁ dhīman na sthātum utsahe

text.ascii: etat saMcintya bhagavan vidhatsva yad anantaram
text.ur: etat saṁcintya bhagavan vidhatsva yad anantaram

text.ascii: evam uktavatIM tAM tu prItimAn RSisattamaH
text.ur: evam uktavatīṁ tāṁ tu prītimān r̥ṣisattamaḥ

text.ascii: uvAca matpriyaM kRtvA kanyaiva tvaM bhaviSyasi
text.ud: उवाच मत्प्रियं कृत्वा कन्यैव त्वं भविष्यसि
text.ur: uvāca matpriyaṁ kr̥tvā kanyaiva tvaṁ bhaviṣyasi

text.ascii: vRNISva ca varaM bhIru yaM tvam icchasi bhAmini
text.ud: वृणीष्व च वरं भीरु यं त्वमिच्छसि भामिनि
text.ur: vr̥ṇīṣva ca varaṁ bhīru yaṁ tvam icchasi bhāmini

text.ascii: vRthA hi na prasAdo me bhUtapUrvaH zucismite
text.ud: वृथा हि न प्रसादो मे भूतपूर्वः शुचिस्मिते
text.ur: vr̥thā hi na prasādo me bhūtapūrvaḥ śucismite

text.ascii: evam uktA varaM vavre gAtrasaugandhyam uttamam
text.ur: evam uktā varaṁ vavre gātrasaugandhyam uttamam

text.ascii: sa cAsyai bhagavAn prAdAn manasaH kAGkSitaM prabhuH
text.ur: sa cāsyai bhagavān prādān manasaḥ kāṅkṣitaṁ prabhuḥ

text.ascii: tato labdhavarA prItA strIbhAvaguNabhUSitA
text.ur: tato labdhavarā prītā strībhāvaguṇabhūṣitā

text.ascii: jagAma saha saMsargam RSiNAdbhutakarmaNA
text.ur: jagāma saha saṁsargam r̥ṣiṇādbhutakarmaṇā

text.ascii: tena gandhavatIty eva nAmAsyAH prathitaM bhuvi
text.ur: tena gandhavatīty eva nāmāsyāḥ prathitaṁ bhuvi

text.ascii: tasyAs tu yojanAd gandham Ajighranti narA bhuvi
text.ur: tasyās tu yojanād gandham ājighranti narā bhuvi

text.ascii: tato yojanagandheti tasyA nAma parizrutam
text.ur: tato yojanagandheti tasyā nāma pariśrutam

text.ascii: parAzaro 'pi bhagavAJ jagAma svaM nivezanam
text.ur: parāśaro ’pi bhagavāñ jagāma svaṁ niveśanam

text.ascii: iti satyavatI hRSTA labdhvA varam anuttamam
text.ur: iti satyavatī hr̥ṣṭā labdhvā varam anuttamam

text.ascii: parAzareNa saMyuktA sadyo garbhaM suSAva sA
text.ud: पराशरेण संयुक्ता सद्यो गर्भं सुषाव सा
text.ur: parāśareṇa saṁyuktā sadyo garbhaṁ suṣāva sā

text.ascii: jajJe ca yamunAdvIpe pArAzaryaH sa vIryavAn
text.ud: जज्ञे च यमुनाद्वीपे पाराशर्यः स वीर्यवान्
text.ur: jajñe ca yamunādvīpe pārāśaryaḥ sa vīryavān

text.ascii: sa mAtaram upasthAya tapasy eva mano dadhe
text.ur: sa mātaram upasthāya tapasy eva mano dadhe

text.ascii: smRto 'haM darzayiSyAmi kRtyeSv iti ca so 'bravIt
text.ur: smr̥to ’haṁ darśayiṣyāmi kr̥tyeṣv iti ca so ’bravīt

text.ascii: evaM dvaipAyano jajJe satyavatyAM parAzarAt
text.ur: evaṁ dvaipāyano jajñe satyavatyāṁ parāśarāt

text.ascii: dvIpe nyastaH sa yad bAlas tasmAd dvaipAyano 'bhavat
text.ur: dvīpe nyastaḥ sa yad bālas tasmād dvaipāyano ’bhavat

text.ascii: pAdApasAriNaM dharmaM vidvAn sa tu yuge yuge
text.ud: पादापसारिणं धर्मं विद्वान्स तु युगे युगे
text.ur: pādāpasāriṇaṁ dharmaṁ vidvān sa tu yuge yuge

text.ascii: AyuH zaktiM ca martyAnAM yugAnugam avekSya ca
text.ud: आयुः शक्तिं च मर्त्यानां युगानुगमवेक्ष्य च
text.ur: āyuḥ śaktiṁ ca martyānāṁ yugānugam avekṣya ca

text.ascii: brahmaNo brAhmaNAnAM ca tathAnugrahakAmyayA
text.ur: brahmaṇo brāhmaṇānāṁ ca tathānugrahakāmyayā

text.ascii: vivyAsa vedAn yasmAc ca tasmAd vyAsa iti smRtaH
text.ur: vivyāsa vedān yasmāc ca tasmād vyāsa iti smr̥taḥ

text.ascii: vedAn adhyApayAm Asa mahAbhAratapaJcamAn
text.ur: vedān adhyāpayām āsa mahābhāratapañcamān

text.ascii: sumantuM jaiminiM pailaM zukaM caiva svam Atmajam
text.ud: सुमन्तुं जैमिनिं पैलं शुकं चैव स्वमात्मजम्
text.ur: sumantuṁ jaiminiṁ pailaṁ śukaṁ caiva svam ātmajam

text.ascii: prabhur variSTho varado vaizaMpAyanam eva ca
text.ur: prabhur variṣṭho varado vaiśaṁpāyanam eva ca

text.ascii: saMhitAs taiH pRthaktvena bhAratasya prakAzitAH
text.ur: saṁhitās taiḥ pr̥thaktvena bhāratasya prakāśitāḥ

text.ascii: tathA bhISmaH zAMtanavo gaGgAyAm amitadyutiH
text.ur: tathā bhīṣmaḥ śāṁtanavo gaṅgāyām amitadyutiḥ

text.ascii: vasuvIryAt samabhavan mahAvIryo mahAyazAH
text.ur: vasuvīryāt samabhavan mahāvīryo mahāyaśāḥ

text.ascii: zUle protaH purANarSir acoraz corazaGkayA
text.ur: śūle protaḥ purāṇarṣir acoraś coraśaṅkayā

text.ascii: aNImANDavya iti vai vikhyAtaH sumahAyazAH
text.ur: aṇīmāṇḍavya iti vai vikhyātaḥ sumahāyaśāḥ

text.ascii: sa dharmam AhUya purA maharSir idam uktavAn
text.ur: sa dharmam āhūya purā maharṣir idam uktavān

text.ascii: iSIkayA mayA bAlyAd ekA viddhA zakuntikA
text.ur: iṣīkayā mayā bālyād ekā viddhā śakuntikā

text.ascii: tat kilbiSaM smare dharma nAnyat pApam ahaM smare
text.ur: tat kilbiṣaṁ smare dharma nānyat pāpam ahaṁ smare

text.ascii: tan me sahasrasamitaM kasmAn nehAjayat tapaH
text.ur: tan me sahasrasamitaṁ kasmān nehājayat tapaḥ

text.ascii: garIyAn brAhmaNavadhaH sarvabhUtavadhAd yataH
text.ur: garīyān brāhmaṇavadhaḥ sarvabhūtavadhād yataḥ

text.ascii: tasmAt tvaM kilbiSAd asmAc chUdrayonau janiSyasi
text.ur: tasmāt tvaṁ kilbiṣād asmāc chūdrayonau janiṣyasi

text.ascii: tena zApena dharmo 'pi zUdrayonAv ajAyata
text.ur: tena śāpena dharmo ’pi śūdrayonāv ajāyata

text.ascii: vidvAn vidurarUpeNa dhArmI tanur akilbiSI
text.ur: vidvān vidurarūpeṇa dhārmī tanur akilbiṣī

text.ascii: saMjayo munikalpas tu jajJe sUto gavalgaNAt
text.ur: saṁjayo munikalpas tu jajñe sūto gavalgaṇāt

text.ascii: sUryAc ca kuntikanyAyAM jajJe karNo mahArathaH
text.ur: sūryāc ca kuntikanyāyāṁ jajñe karṇo mahārathaḥ

text.ascii: sahajaM kavacaM bibhrat kuNDaloddyotitAnanaH
text.ur: sahajaṁ kavacaṁ bibhrat kuṇḍaloddyotitānanaḥ

text.ascii: anugrahArthaM lokAnAM viSNur lokanamaskRtaH
text.ur: anugrahārthaṁ lokānāṁ viṣṇur lokanamaskr̥taḥ

text.ascii: vasudevAt tu devakyAM prAdurbhUto mahAyazAH
text.ur: vasudevāt tu devakyāṁ prādurbhūto mahāyaśāḥ

text.ascii: anAdinidhano devaH sa kartA jagataH prabhuH
text.ud: अनादिनिधनो देवः स कर्ता जगतः प्रभुः
text.ur: anādinidhano devaḥ sa kartā jagataḥ prabhuḥ

text.ascii: avyaktam akSaraM brahma pradhAnaM nirguNAtmakam
text.ur: avyaktam akṣaraṁ brahma pradhānaṁ nirguṇātmakam

text.ascii: AtmAnam avyayaM caiva prakRtiM prabhavaM param
text.ur: ātmānam avyayaṁ caiva prakr̥tiṁ prabhavaṁ param

text.ascii: puruSaM vizvakarmANaM sattvayogaM dhruvAkSaram
text.ur: puruṣaṁ viśvakarmāṇaṁ sattvayogaṁ dhruvākṣaram

text.ascii: anantam acalaM devaM haMsaM nArAyaNaM prabhum
text.ur: anantam acalaṁ devaṁ haṁsaṁ nārāyaṇaṁ prabhum

text.ascii: dhAtAram ajaraM nityaM tam AhuH param avyayam
text.ur: dhātāram ajaraṁ nityaṁ tam āhuḥ param avyayam

text.ascii: puruSaH sa vibhuH kartA sarvabhUtapitAmahaH
text.ur: puruṣaḥ sa vibhuḥ kartā sarvabhūtapitāmahaḥ

text.ascii: dharmasaMvardhanArthAya prajajJe 'ndhakavRSNiSu
text.ur: dharmasaṁvardhanārthāya prajajñe ’ndhakavr̥ṣṇiṣu

text.ascii: astrajJau tu mahAvIryau sarvazastravizAradau
text.ur: astrajñau tu mahāvīryau sarvaśastraviśāradau

text.ascii: sAtyakiH kRtavarmA ca nArAyaNam anuvratau
text.ur: sātyakiḥ kr̥tavarmā ca nārāyaṇam anuvratau

text.ascii: satyakAd dhRdikAc caiva jajJAte 'stravizAradau
text.ur: satyakād dhr̥dikāc caiva jajñāte ’straviśāradau

text.ascii: bharadvAjasya ca skannaM droNyAM zukram avardhata
text.ur: bharadvājasya ca skannaṁ droṇyāṁ śukram avardhata

text.ascii: maharSer ugratapasas tasmAd droNo vyajAyata
text.ur: maharṣer ugratapasas tasmād droṇo vyajāyata

text.ascii: gautamAn mithunaM jajJe zarastambAc charadvataH
text.ur: gautamān mithunaṁ jajñe śarastambāc charadvataḥ

text.ascii: azvatthAmnaz ca jananI kRpaz caiva mahAbalaH
text.ur: aśvatthāmnaś ca jananī kr̥paś caiva mahābalaḥ

text.ascii: azvatthAmA tato jajJe droNAd astrabhRtAM varaH
text.ur: aśvatthāmā tato jajñe droṇād astrabhr̥tāṁ varaḥ

text.ascii: tathaiva dhRSTadyumno 'pi sAkSAd agnisamadyutiH
text.ur: tathaiva dhr̥ṣṭadyumno ’pi sākṣād agnisamadyutiḥ

text.ascii: vaitAne karmaNi tate pAvakAt samajAyata
text.ur: vaitāne karmaṇi tate pāvakāt samajāyata

text.ascii: vIro droNavinAzAya dhanuSA saha vIryavAn
text.ur: vīro droṇavināśāya dhanuṣā saha vīryavān

text.ascii: tathaiva vedyAM kRSNApi jajJe tejasvinI zubhA
text.ud: तथैव वेद्यां कृष्णापि जज्ञे तेजस्विनी शुभा
text.ur: tathaiva vedyāṁ kr̥ṣṇāpi jajñe tejasvinī śubhā

text.ascii: vibhrAjamAnA vapuSA bibhratI rUpam uttamam
text.ur: vibhrājamānā vapuṣā bibhratī rūpam uttamam

text.ascii: prahrAdaziSyo nagnajit subalaz cAbhavat tataH
text.ur: prahrādaśiṣyo nagnajit subalaś cābhavat tataḥ

text.ascii: tasya prajA dharmahantrI jajJe devaprakopanAt
text.ur: tasya prajā dharmahantrī jajñe devaprakopanāt

text.ascii: gAndhArarAjaputro 'bhUc chakuniH saubalas tathA
text.ur: gāndhārarājaputro ’bhūc chakuniḥ saubalas tathā

text.ascii: duryodhanasya mAtA ca jajJAte 'rthavidAv ubhau
text.ur: duryodhanasya mātā ca jajñāte ’rthavidāv ubhau

text.ascii: kRSNadvaipAyanAj jajJe dhRtarASTro janezvaraH
text.ur: kr̥ṣṇadvaipāyanāj jajñe dhr̥tarāṣṭro janeśvaraḥ

text.ascii: kSetre vicitravIryasya pANDuz caiva mahAbalaH
text.ur: kṣetre vicitravīryasya pāṇḍuś caiva mahābalaḥ

text.ascii: pANDos tu jajJire paJca putrA devasamAH pRthak
text.ud: पाण्डोस्तु जज्ञिरे पञ्च पुत्रा देवसमाः पृथक्
text.ur: pāṇḍos tu jajñire pañca putrā devasamāḥ pr̥thak

text.ascii: dvayoH striyor guNajyeSThas teSAm AsId yudhiSThiraH
text.ur: dvayoḥ striyor guṇajyeṣṭhas teṣām āsīd yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

text.ascii: dharmAd yudhiSThiro jajJe mArutAt tu vRkodaraH
text.ur: dharmād yudhiṣṭhiro jajñe mārutāt tu vr̥kodaraḥ

text.ascii: indrAd dhanaMjayaH zrImAn sarvazastrabhRtAM varaH
text.ur: indrād dhanaṁjayaḥ śrīmān sarvaśastrabhr̥tāṁ varaḥ

text.ascii: jajJAte rUpasaMpannAv azvibhyAM tu yamAv ubhau
text.ur: jajñāte rūpasaṁpannāv aśvibhyāṁ tu yamāv ubhau

text.ascii: nakulaH sahadevaz ca guruzuzrUSaNe ratau
text.ur: nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca guruśuśrūṣaṇe ratau

text.ascii: tathA putrazataM jajJe dhRtarASTrasya dhImataH
text.ur: tathā putraśataṁ jajñe dhr̥tarāṣṭrasya dhīmataḥ

text.ascii: duryodhanaprabhRtayo yuyutsuH karaNas tathA
text.ur: duryodhanaprabhr̥tayo yuyutsuḥ karaṇas tathā

text.ascii: abhimanyuH subhadrAyAm arjunAd abhyajAyata
text.ur: abhimanyuḥ subhadrāyām arjunād abhyajāyata

text.ascii: svasrIyo vAsudevasya pautraH pANDor mahAtmanaH
text.ur: svasrīyo vāsudevasya pautraḥ pāṇḍor mahātmanaḥ

text.ascii: pANDavebhyo 'pi paJcabhyaH kRSNAyAM paJca jajJire
text.ur: pāṇḍavebhyo ’pi pañcabhyaḥ kr̥ṣṇāyāṁ pañca jajñire

text.ascii: kumArA rUpasaMpannAH sarvazastravizAradAH
text.ur: kumārā rūpasaṁpannāḥ sarvaśastraviśāradāḥ

text.ascii: prativindhyo yudhiSThirAt sutasomo vRkodarAt
text.ur: prativindhyo yudhiṣṭhirāt sutasomo vr̥kodarāt

text.ascii: arjunAc chrutakIrtis tu zatAnIkas tu nAkuliH
text.ur: arjunāc chrutakīrtis tu śatānīkas tu nākuliḥ

text.ascii: tathaiva sahadevAc ca zrutasenaH pratApavAn
text.ur: tathaiva sahadevāc ca śrutasenaḥ pratāpavān

text.ascii: hiDimbAyAM ca bhImena vane jajJe ghaTotkacaH
text.ud: हिडिम्बायां च भीमेन वने जज्ञे घटोत्कचः
text.ur: hiḍimbāyāṁ ca bhīmena vane jajñe ghaṭotkacaḥ

text.ascii: zikhaNDI drupadAj jajJe kanyA putratvam AgatA
text.ur: śikhaṇḍī drupadāj jajñe kanyā putratvam āgatā

text.ascii: yAM yakSaH puruSaM cakre sthUNaH priyacikIrSayA
text.ud: यां यक्षः पुरुषं चक्रे स्थूणः प्रियचिकीर्षया
text.ur: yāṁ yakṣaḥ puruṣaṁ cakre sthūṇaḥ priyacikīrṣayā

text.ascii: kurUNAM vigrahe tasmin samAgacchan bahUny atha
text.ur: kurūṇāṁ vigrahe tasmin samāgacchan bahūny atha

text.ascii: rAjJAM zatasahasrANi yotsyamAnAni saMyuge
text.ur: rājñāṁ śatasahasrāṇi yotsyamānāni saṁyuge

text.ascii: teSAm aparimeyAni nAmadheyAni sarvazaH
text.ur: teṣām aparimeyāni nāmadheyāni sarvaśaḥ

text.ascii: na zakyaM parisaMkhyAtuM varSANAm ayutair api
text.ur: na śakyaṁ parisaṁkhyātuṁ varṣāṇām ayutair api

text.ascii: ete tu kIrtitA mukhyA yair AkhyAnam idaM tatam
text.ud: एते तु कीर्तिता मुख्या यैराख्यानमिदं ततम्
text.ur: ete tu kīrtitā mukhyā yair ākhyānam idaṁ tatam
